
{{alias}}( x )
    Computes the absolute value in-place.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ndarray|ArrayLikeObject
        Input array.

    Returns
    -------
    y: ndarray
        Input array `x`.

    Examples
    --------
    // Provide an array-like object:
    > var x = new {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}( [ -1.0, -2.0 ] );
    > var y = {{alias}}( x )
    <Float64Array>[ 1.0, 2.0 ]
    > var bool = ( y === x )
    true

    // Provide an ndarray:
    > x = {{alias:@stdlib/ndarray/array}}( [ [ -1.0, -2.0 ], [ -3.0, -4.0 ] ] );
    > y = {{alias}}( x )
    <ndarray>
    > y.get( 0, 1 )
    2.0
    > bool = ( y === x )
    true

    See Also
    --------
